amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-457 to reduce overall authorization level by 10%. Excludes military personnel, DoD federal civilian workforce, and defense health program accounts from the 10% reduction.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the overall authorization level by 10%; excluding military personnel, DoD federal civilian workforce, and defense health program accounts from the 10% reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 93 - 324 (Roll no. 148).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A008) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 93 - 324 (Roll no. 148).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 93 - 324 (Roll no. 148).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Pocan.
